heading: Link Your Prime Account for +4 Free Tier Skips!
content: Blizzard just announced that until September 7th you can to receive +4 Free Tier Skips on your Season of the Malignant Battle Pass. For those of you who have completed your Battle Pass already, you can at least be happy that your friends can catch up faster now! This will be available for the following platforms: If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Sanctuary here we come! Written by:
